snippet: There was a point when the Philadelphia 76ers were actually feeling great about the season. It was on opening night. Now they’re looking for their first victory since Jan. 29.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers, optimistic at start of season, have not had victory since Jan 29; main issues seem to be team’s inability to defend in transition, selfishness on offense and inability to catch up after falling behind; Sixers’ front office is looking ahead to night of the NBA draft lottery.
lead_paragraph: There was a point when the Philadelphia 76ers were actually feeling great about the season. It was on opening night. Now they’re looking for their first victory since Jan. 29.

headline.main: Draft Lottery Can’t Come Soon Enough for 76ers
headline.print_headline: Eyeing Future, Stuck in the Present
